languages.text: "Не беспокойтесь, Дитя. Ваши люди готовы погибнуть за вас в любую минуту — хоть под градом выстрелов, хоть на разрушенной станции. И так будет всегда".

traits.locale_text: "Не беспокойтесь, Дитя. Ваши люди готовы погибнуть за вас в любую минуту — хоть под градом выстрелов, хоть на разрушенной станции. И так будет всегда".

languages.text: "You need not worry, Child. Your people are ready to die for you at any moment, be it under a hail of gunfire or in the ruins of this broken station. And so it will always be."
languages.original_text: "Не беспокойтесь, Дитя. Ваши люди готовы погибнуть за вас в любую минуту — хоть под градом выстрелов, хоть на разрушенной станции. И так будет всегда".

traits.locale_text: "You need not worry, Child. Your people are ready to die for you at any moment, be it under a hail of gunfire or in the ruins of broken station. And it will always be this way."
"You need not worry, Child. Your people are ready to die for you at any moment, be it under a hail of gunfire or in the ruins of broken station. And it will always be this way."
"You need not worry, Child. Your people are ready to die for you at any moment, be it under a hail of gunfire or in the ruins of this broken station. And so it will always be."
"You need not worry, Child. Your people are ready to die for you at any moment, be it under a hail of gunfire or in the ruins of this broken station. And so it will always be."
"You need not worry, Child. Your people are ready to die for you at any moment, be it under a hail of gunfire or in the ruins of this broken station. And so it will always be."

languages.text: “不必担心，圣子，你的臣民随时做好了为你献身的准备。无论是在枪林弹雨中，还是在这座破败舰站的废墟里，这一点永远都不会变。”
languages.original_text: "You need not worry, Child. Your people are ready to die for you at any moment, be it under a hail of gunfire or in the ruins of this broken station. And so it will always be."

traits.locale_text: “不必担心，孩子，你的臣民随时做好了为你献身的准备。无论是在枪林弹雨中，还是在这座破败舰站的废墟里，这一点永远都不会变。”

languages.text: «No tienes de qué preocuparte, niña. Tu gente está lista para morir por ti en cualquier momento, ya sea bajo una lluvia de balas o en las ruinas de esta estación condenada. Y siempre lo estará».
languages.original_text: "You need not worry, Child. Your people are ready to die for you at any moment, be it under a hail of gunfire or in the ruins of this broken station. And so it will always be."

traits.locale_text: «No tienes de qué preocuparte, niña. Tu gente está lista para morir por ti en cualquier momento, ya sea bajo una lluvia de balas o en las ruinas de esta estación condenada. Y siempre lo estará».

languages.text: 「心配には及びません、御子よ。従者はあなたのためにいつでも死ぬ覚悟ができています。銃弾の雨が降ろうと、この壊れたステーションが廃墟になろうとも。それは変わりません」
languages.original_text: "You need not worry, Child. Your people are ready to die for you at any moment, be it under a hail of gunfire or in the ruins of this broken station. And so it will always be."

traits.locale_text: 「心配には及びません、御子よ。従者はあなたのためにいつでも死ぬ覚悟ができています。銃弾の雨が降ろうと、この壊れたステーションが廃墟になろうとも。それは変わりません」
「心配には及びません、御子よ。従者はあなたのためにいつでも死ぬ覚悟ができています。銃弾の雨が降ろうと、この壊れたステーションが廃墟になろうとも。それは変わりません」

languages.text: « Ne vous inquiétez pas, Enfant. Vos serviteurs sont prêts à mourir pour vous à tout moment, aussi bien sous une pluie de balles que dans les ruines de cette station. Cela ne changera jamais. »
languages.original_text: "You need not worry, Child. Your people are ready to die for you at any moment, be it under a hail of gunfire or in the ruins of this broken station. And so it will always be."

traits.locale_text: « Ne vous inquiétez pas, mon enfant. Vos serviteurs sont prêts à mourir pour vous à tout moment, aussi bien sous une pluie de balles que dans les ruines de cette station. Cela ne changera jamais. »

languages.text: "Ihr müsst Euch keine Sorgen machen, Kind. Eure Leute sind jederzeit bereit, für Euch zu sterben, ob im Kugelhagel oder in den Ruinen dieser desolaten Station. Und so wird es auch immer bleiben."
languages.original_text: "You need not worry, Child. Your people are ready to die for you at any moment, be it under a hail of gunfire or in the ruins of this broken station. And so it will always be."

traits.locale_text: "Ihr müsst Euch keine Sorgen machen, Kind. Eure Leute sind jederzeit bereit, für Euch zu sterben, ob im Kugelhagel oder in den Ruinen dieser desolaten Station. Und so wird es auch immer bleiben."

languages.original_text: "You need not worry, Child. Your people are ready to die for you at any moment, be it under a hail of gunfire or in the ruins of this broken station. And so it will always be."

languages.text: "Endişe etmene gerek yok Çocuk. İster silah ateşi altında olsun, isterse de paramparça olmuş bir istasyonun kalıntılarında, halkın senin için her daim ölmeye hazırdır. Her zaman da öyle olacak."
languages.original_text: "You need not worry, Child. Your people are ready to die for you at any moment, be it under a hail of gunfire or in the ruins of this broken station. And so it will always be."

traits.locale_text: "Endişe etmene gerek yok Çocuk. İster silah ateşi altında olsun, isterse de paramparça olmuş bir istasyonun kalıntılarında, halkın senin için her daim ölmeye hazırdır. Her zaman da öyle olacak."
